subject: Doping (Sports)
Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After seeing his ranking plummet during a ban from play for four months when he tested positive for a stimulant, Marin Cilic found a new appreciation for the game.
snippet: After seeing his ranking plummet during a ban from play for four months when he tested positive for a stimulant, Marin Cilic found a new appreciation for the game.
